snippet: Shavonte Zellous’s jumper with 0.5 seconds left lifted the Indiana Fever over the Connecticut Sun in Game 2 of the W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference Finals to even the series.
abstract: Indiana Fever beat Connecticut Sun, 78-76, in Game 2 of the WNBA Eastern Conference finals to even the series.
lead_paragraph: Shavonte Zellous’s jumper with 0.5 seconds left lifted the Indiana Fever over the Connecticut Sun in Game 2 of the W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference Finals to even the series.

headline.seo: Fever Even W.N.B.A. Series With Sun
headline.main: Fever Even W.N.B.A. Series With Sun
